text: Robert "Bobby" McFerrin, Jr. (born March 11, 1950 in Manhattan, New York City) is an American singer and musician. He is probably best known for his 1988 hit song, "Don't Worry, Be Happy". In his musical career he has won 10 Grammy Awards. ==Discography== ===Albums=== Bobby McFerrin has made 19 studio albums during his career: Year Single 1982 Bobby McFerrin 1984 The Voice 1987 Spontaneous Inventions 1987 Elephant's Child 1988 Simple Pleasures 1988 Don't Worry, Be Happy 1990 How the Rhino Got His Skin/How the Camel Got His Hump 1990 Medicine Music 1992 Play 1992 Hush 1991 Many Faces of Bird 1994 Sorrow Is Not Forever 1995 Paper Music 1996 Bang!
